data.ProductDescription:
By borrowing at a fixed interest rate, you'll know exactly how much your repayments will be every month. This can help you plan and manage your finances in advance, without needing to worry about changing market conditions.
Loan amounts up to £50,000 may also be considered.

Eligibility.Description:
Require the loan for business use.
Apply for a minimum of £1000.00.
Be a sole trader, partner or director with authority to borrow on behalf of your business.
Be aged 18 or over.
Have an annual turnover between £0 - £1,000,000.
Eligibility.EligibilityNotes:
All lending is subject to a satisfactory credit assessment and we will need your permission to carry out a credit check on you and your business.
You should not apply for an amount that you cannot comfortably afford to repay now and in the future to avoid the possibility of legal action.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: An arrangement fee will apply and is related to the amount you choose to borrow. These terms will be discussed with you before you take out the loan. To cover our administration costs for smaller facilities, there will be a minimum scale charge of between £100.00 and £250.00 resulting in the overall charge being more than 1.5%.

BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: Choose a term from one to 10 years.

Repay a consistent monthly amount for the entire length of your loan term.
Where a fixed rate period is shorter than the overall term of borrowing, the fixed rate will change to an agreed variable rate from the end of the fixed rate period through to the loan maturity. There is always a possibility that interest rates may go down leaving fixed rate loan repayments at a higher level compared to an equivalent variable rate loan. However, if interest rates rise, repayment amounts on a fixed rate loan will remain at the same level.

BenefitDetail.BenefitName: Borrow on a secured or unsecured basis
BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: Borrow on a secured or unsecured basis.
Capital repayment holidays available in certain circumstances only.

data.ProductDescription:
Our Base Rate Loan is a flexible finance option that can be tailored to suit your short or long-term financial goals. It is linked to the Bank of England bank rate so the interest rate that you pay will change as the bank rate changes, resulting in your monthly repayments increasing or decreasing.
Loan amounts in excess of £25,000 may also be considered.

Eligibility.Description:
Require the loan for business use.
Apply for a minimum of £1000.00.
Be a sole trader, partner or director with authority to borrow on behalf of your business.
Be aged 18 or over.
Have an annual turnover between £0 - £1,000,000.
Eligibility.EligibilityNotes:
All lending is subject to a satisfactory credit assessment and we will need your permission to carry out a credit check on you and your business.
You should not apply for an amount that you cannot comfortably afford to repay now and in the future to avoid the possibility of legal action.

FeeSubDetails.FeesAndChargesNotes: An arrangement fee will apply and is related to the amount you choose to borrow. These terms will be discussed with you before you take out the loan. To cover our administration costs for smaller facilities, there will be a minimum scale charge of between £100.00 and £250.00 resulting in the overall charge being more than 1.5%.

BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: Choose a term from one to 25 years.
Take advantage of today’s low bank rate.

BenefitDetail.BenefitName: Borrow on a secured or unsecured basis
BenefitDetail.BenefitDescription: Borrow on a secured or unsecured basis.
Capital repayment holidays available in certain circumstances only.

data.ProductDescription: Our fixed rate loan has a fixed interest rate for the whole term, so you'll know exactly what the repayments will be each month allowing you to plan your finances more easily. Fixed rate loans are less dependent on market conditions giving you confidence that you will be able to meet your financial obligations. (amounts up to £50,000 may also be considered)
